|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"8WAPN08..3A1G" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *"1WAPN12...A1G" is printed on a label affixed to the board. Per the manual, the default SSID is '''dlink'''. ==Links of Interest== ===GPL Code=== *[http://tsd.dlink.com.tw/downloads2008list.asp?t=1&OS=GPL D-link GPL site] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== Header J1 (115200n8) 
Left <--- [|Rx|___|3.3V|GND|Tx|] --> Right
''NOTE: holes for connector are filled with soldel with high melting point.'' {{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
